ygData.messageBody:
;o)
You are probably right on... But hope you aren't.

-----Original Message-----
From: Andy Smith [mailto:AndyS@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 12:46 PM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial


From: Andy Smith <AndyS@...>

To confuse us and provide a way for players to experiment with giving
diamonds away to various NPCs in the vain hope that one of them will return
those diamonds to us in dust form.

-----Original Message-----
From: "Jason Smith" <jj@...>

Anyone know the purpose of the Gem cutter?
